org.harctoolbox.devslashlirc

Interface IMode2

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mode2LircDevice

    public interface IMode2
extends Closeable
    This interface specifies the commands of "mode2" Lirc hardware, device or driver.

      • open

        void open()
   throws LircDeviceException
        Opens the hardware using the previously given device name.
        Throws:

      • receive

        int[] receive()
       throws NotSupportedException
        Reads an IR signal as a sequence of durations.
        Returns:
        durations as an integer array, all positive.
        Throws:
        NotSupportedException - if the hardwared does not support receiving.

      • send

        void send(int[] data)
   throws NotSupportedException
        Sends the provided data as a sequence of durations. The data is send without setting the modulation frequency, so the exact outcome may depend on the hardware, or on previously sent commands.
        Parameters:
        data - interger array of durations.
        Throws:
        NotSupportedException - if the hardware does not support sending.

      • send

        void send(int[] data,
          int frequency)
   throws NotSupportedException
        Sends the provided data as a sequence of durations. The data is send without setting the modulation frequency, so the exact outcome may depend on the hardware, or on previously sent commands.
        Parameters:
        data - interger array of durations.
        frequency - Frequency in Hz.
        Throws:
        NotSupportedException - if the hardware does not support sending, or setting of the modulation frequency.
